column1: Programming in a large-scale relational database environment using procedural languages. Topics covered in the course include: procedural extension of query languages, runtime error handling, subprograms (procedures and functions), packages, database triggers, dynamic query language. Optional topics include transaction management, reliability, and security. PREREQUISITE(S): IT240 and (CSC 212 or CSC 242 or CSC 243 or CSC 262 or CSC 224 or CSC 300 or CSC 309).
